meanings.definition: (文法)語幹の音節数が変化しない語形変化を示す
meanings.english_definition: (grammar) Exhibiting inflection in which the stem has the same number of syllables in all forms.

examples.sentence: Parisyllabical nouns maintain a consistent number of syllables throughout their declension.
examples.translation: パリシラビカルな名詞は、その格変化を通して一貫した音節数を維持します。
